thread.title: Child killer Ian Huntley has told fellow lags to call him ‘feminine version of his name – Lian’ as it’s revealed male inmates can order make-up from prison canteen
thread.title_full: Child killer Ian Huntley has told fellow lags to call him ‘feminine version of his name – Lian’ as it’s revealed male inmates can order make-up from prison canteen

author: oloveridgegreene
title: Child killer Ian Huntley has told fellow lags to call him ‘feminine version of his name – Lian’ as it’s revealed male inmates can order make-up from prison canteen
text:
Opinion SOHAM MURDERER'S 'NEW NAME' Child killer Ian Huntley has told fellow lags to call him ‘feminine version of his name – Lian’ as it’s revealed male inmates can order make-up from prison canteen 
Lags at notorious all-male Frankland prison are able to order a range of cosmetics from jail canteen Exclusive BY JONATHAN REILLY, TOM WELLS AND SEAN-PAUL DORAN 14th February 2017, 10:26 pm
